bayes_network

Class BNQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes_network.BNQuery

  • public class BNQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects of this class are used for querying a conditional probability distribution for a single BNNode in a BayesianNetwork
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<pair.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> queryItems
      Each query item is a pair of integers where the first integer refers to an Attribute ID and the second integer refers to a nominal valud ID of the attribute.

      • queryItems

        private java.util.ArrayList<pair.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> queryItems
        Each query item is a pair of integers where the first integer refers to an Attribute ID and the second integer refers to a nominal valud ID of the attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • addQueryItem

        public void addQueryItem(data.attribute.Attribute attr,
                java.lang.Integer nomValueId)
        Add a query item to this query
        Parameters:
        attr - the Attribute this query is querying for
        nominalValueId - the nominal value ID specified for this Attribute

      • containsAttribute

        public java.lang.Boolean containsAttribute(data.attribute.Attribute attr)
        Determines whether this BNQuery includes the value of a specific attribute
        Parameters:
        attr - the target Attribute
        Returns:
        true if this query is specifying a value for this specific Attribute

      • getValueForQueryAttribute

        public java.lang.Integer getValueForQueryAttribute(data.attribute.Attribute attr)
        Gets the value for a specific query attribute. If this attribute is not specified by this query, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        attr - the target Attribute
        Returns:
        the value of target Attribute specified in this query. null if this Attribute is not specified in this query
